title: ReviewDecision
description: Schema for agent reviewer pattern output. Defines the structure of a review decision including approval/rejection, confidence, feedback, and specific issues found.

decision.description: Whether the reviewed output is approved or rejected

confidence.description: Reviewer's confidence in the decision (0.0 to 1.0)

feedback.description: Specific, actionable feedback explaining the decision

issues.description: List of specific issues found in the output

classification.description: Classification marking for this review decision
